Dokidoki Oyako Lesson: Oshiete H na Oben:
Based on the hentai game by Tinker Bell.
Shio Atsushi is a professor who will provide home class to two daughters of different families : Arisa and Maya.
But it seems this won`t be only educationnal purpose since the two girls show interest to that man.
['Dokidoki Oyako Lesson: Oshiete H na Obenkyou']
['Sato, Maya', 'Sato, Nami', 'Kumagai, Arisa', 'Kumagai, Aki', 'Ikuta, Atsushi', 'Hitotsuya, Chidori']
